grid.title: MAC Activity Activity Type Rate Config
grid.sqlSelect: SELECT MATRC.ID, MATRC.EndUserID, CAST(C.Organization_Id AS VARCHAR(2))+' - '+C.CUSTOMER_NAME AS EndUserName, MATRC.ActivityTypeID, LTRIM(RTRIM(C.Customer_Name)) + ' - ' + CCL.LIST_VALUE AS ActivityTypeName, MATRC.Min, MATRC.Max, MATRC.Rate, MATRC.IsActive FROM MAC_ActivityTypeRate_Config MATRC (nolock) LEFT JOIN dbo.Customers C (nolock) on C.customer_id = MATRC.EndUserID LEFT JOIN CUSTOM_COL_LISTS CCL (nolock) ON CCL.CUSTOM_COL_LIST_ID = MATRC.ActivityTypeID
grid.sqlUpdate: UPDATE MAC_ActivityTypeRate_Config SET EndUserID = @EndUserID, ActivityTypeID = @ActivityTypeID, Min = @Min, Max = @Max, Rate = @Rate, ModifiedOn = GETUTCDATE(), ModifiedBy = @__UserId__, IsActive = @IsActive WHERE ID=@ID

column.label: End User
column.dataSelect: SELECT DISTINCT TOP 100 PERCENT P.END_USER_ID AS EndUserID, CAST(C.Organization_Id AS VARCHAR(2))+' - '+C.CUSTOMER_NAME AS EndUserName FROM dbo.PROJECTS P (nolock) inner join dbo.Lookups_Active_V LP (nolock) on LP.LOOKUP_ID = P.PROJECT_TYPE_ID inner join dbo.CUSTOMERS C (nolock) on P.END_USER_ID = C.CUSTOMER_ID WHERE ISNULL(C.ext_customer_id,'') NOT LIKE 'OLD%' AND LP.type_code = 'job_type' and LP.lookup_code = 'service_account' AND C.ACTIVE_FLAG = 'Y' AND C.end_user_parent_id IS NOT NULL ORDER BY EndUserName, EndUserID

column.label: Activity Type
column.dataSelect: SELECT TOP 100 PERCENT CCL.CUSTOM_COL_LIST_ID AS ActivityTypeID, LTRIM(RTRIM(C.Customer_Name)) + ' - ' + CCL.LIST_VALUE AS ActivityTypeName FROM CUSTOM_CUST_COLUMNS CCC (nolock) INNER JOIN CUSTOM_COL_LISTS CCL (nolock) ON CCL.CUSTOM_CUST_COL_ID = CCC.CUSTOM_CUST_COL_ID INNER JOIN dbo.CUSTOMERS C (nolock) ON C.CUSTOMER_ID = CCC.CUSTOMER_ID WHERE CCC.ACTIVE_FLAG = 'Y' AND CCL.ACTIVE_FLAG = 'Y' AND CCC.IS_DROPLIST = 'Y' AND CCC.COLUMN_DESC = 'Activity Type' AND (@EndUserID IS NULL OR CCC.CUSTOMER_ID = (SELECT end_user_parent_id FROM dbo.CUSTOMERS WHERE CUSTOMER_ID = @EndUserID)) ORDER BY ActivityTypeName, ActivityTypeID
